name: Agovest
description: For the 125M middle-income women in LATAM struggling with financial stress, A'govest offers a gamified financial platform, backed by behavioral research, that empowers women to build wealth using our marketplace for embedded finance.
one_liner: For the 125M middle-income women in LATAM struggling with financial stress, A'govest offers a gamified financial platform, backed by behavioral research, that empowers women to build wealth using our marketplace for embedded finance.
